question:
Nominated members of Rajya Sabha have a right to vote in the:
  1. Election of Vice-President of India
  2. Election of President of India
  3. Voting for Constitutional Amendment Bills
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: The nominated members of Rajya Sabha have a right to vote in the election of the Vice-President of India, they are not entitled to vote in the election of the President of India. Nominated members of Rajya Sabha are also entitled to vote for Constitutional Amendment Bills. Recently, they voted on GST Bill.
